segments.text: Which kind of internet connection do you want to get ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which one do you feel is best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would get DEL if I were you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the best choice ; plus , it won't tie up your phone line .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure what that means .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dial-up is connected through your phone , unlike DEL .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That'll make it impossible for me to use .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly . With DEL you don't have that problem .
segments.speaker: S2
